html.p: The Insteon app includes a database of Insteon messages that is based upon Insteon's official documentation. However, the documentation is incomplete and may be missing some messages. Messages without the corresponding information are listed below.

search.query: sourcetype=insteon category=* subcategory=* NOT command=* `prettify_command(command)` | stats count as event_count by category_name category subcategory command | sort -event_count
